titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4954) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for a voluntary program for prescription drug coverage under the Medicare Program, to modernize and reform payments and the regulatory structure of the Medicare Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-553, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 183.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 465.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 213 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/27/2002--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4954 (medicare modernization and prescription drug benefit).
